content:
Dear Dr. %ApplicantName%,

We have reviewed your application for a faculty position in %PositionName% at the King Abdullah University of Science and Technology.

I regret to inform you that we have decided not to pursue your case any further.

Thank you for your interest in KAUST.

Sincerely,

Prof. %CommiteeChairName%, 

Chair of the Search Committee
subject: Rejection Letter
